creditline: The John R. Van Derlip Fund; purchase from the collection of Elizabeth and Willard Clark
description: bulbous, squat basket with thick, crisscrossing weave; narrow mouth; slightly lopsided handle made from three bamboo sticks of varying thickness woven together with decorative knots; one side of handle has irregular twig
medium: Bamboo (hōbichiku or susudake), bamboo (madake?), rattan, lacquer
title: Long Life and Good Fortune Flower Basket
